message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more
My turn.  Let's split a bit more evenly, with a slight advantage for me to make up for the inflation.
Still willing to compromise, but need a bit more
Time is running out, and the deal is getting worse for both of us.  I'm offering a slightly better split for you than before.
Getting closer, meet me in the middle
This is my final offer. A perfectly even split. Take it or leave it - the deal will only get worse for you from here on.
